titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Stainless steel Vaccuum Feed-Through for optical sensor, 41 millimeter diameter, MANSKE part number 43935/2.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/29/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Stainless steel Vaccuum Feed-Through for optical sensor, 41 millimeter diameter, MANSKE part number 43935/2.
